```
ropsten: {
  provider: () => new HDWalletProvider(mnemonic, `https://ropsten.infura.io/${infuraKey}`),
  network_id: 3,
  timeoutBlocks: 200, // # of blocks before a deployment times out (minimum/default: 50)
}
```
